titleStmt.title: The life and death of the rich man and Lazarus anothomized by way of meditation. With the rich mans funerall sermon. By George Phillips.
titleStmt.author: Phillips, George, fl. 1597.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Edward Allde] for Edward White, and are to be solde at his shop neere vnto the little north doore of Paules at the signe of the Gun,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop neere vnto the little north doore of Paules at the signe of the Gun
